null: By default, every step you scroll up/down your mouse wheel will trigger the roller to scroll down.
d: In the debounce mode, the roller scrolls down if only you stop scrolling your mouse wheel for at least 1.5 seconds.
di: In the debounce mode, the roller scrolls down immediately, then it won't scroll again till the your mouse wheel action stop for at least 1.5 seconds.
t: In throttle mode, the roller scrolls down at the beginning of your move on scrolling mouse wheel, however, it will then enter 2 seconds cool down time that ignores more moves.
